title: CarHire.com
text: Help these dudes find their car! Add, remove, delete and even update (you know the drill) cars to the server with this React CRUD app using AJAX, context api, hooks and react hook forms library validation

title: 3D Earth
text: Use the GUI to generate different types of galaxies, change the colours, make them swirly... Endless options and all of them pretty

title: Your Groceries Advisor
text: A weather forecast app that returns weather forecast based on both user geo-location and user-inputted location. Features regex validation on user input.

title: Guess Your Animals Game
text: This app was made in a team of four as part of a hackathon challenge. The goal was to produce an app in 6 hours to help children learning to read. Through using a text-to-speech API, users are encouraged to practice pronunciation.

title: News Today
text: Help these dudes find their car! Add, remove, delete and even update (you know the drill) cars to the server with this React CRUD app using AJAX, context api, hooks and react hook forms library validation

title: Homeage Piece
text: Creating a website from a Figma design using flexbox to create a responsive layout, simple but essential stuff
